title: Shooter's anger at YouTube motivated shooting: police
text:
Shooter's anger at YouTube motivated shooting: police Wednesday, April 04, 2018 - 01:28 
An Iranian-born woman who blogged about veganism and believed YouTube was suppressing her videos opened fire at the company's California headquarters because she was angry with the site's policies, police said on Wednesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
